subject: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Hi, Lyle
Stevens Koroma here, and I'm very excited to be your new Account Manager 
at Investors Group of East Gate LLC! alias Investors Solution LLC.
My role will be to guide you through anything you need concerning mutual 
funds. If you ever have questions, run into problems, consider an 
upgrade, or anything at all, I'm the one for the job. We will be working 
closely together, and I'll be helping you navigate your new mutual fund 
investment account.

I'm looking forward to meeting you. Do you have a few minutes this week 
to chat? If you're interested, I'd love to hear more about how soon 
you'd like to start. Let me know some pros and cons and if there's any 
way I can be of assistance to guide you through this process.

Attached is the quick investment guide, I'm here for whatever you need 
and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Thanks with regards
Stevens Bai Koroma
Account Manager
IGEG LLC!

Please review the license regulations below;
https://www.newyorkbusinessgo.com/company/5130181/
-
https://www.newyorkbusinessgo.com/company/4204282/

-- 
INVESTORS SOLUTION LLC,
PO Box 1612 Southampton, New York 11969.
Office Address:
2972 Nostrand Ave. Brooklyn, New York, 11229

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Dear Stevens Bai Koroma,

Thank you for your email and the introduction. I am interested in exploring mutual fund investment opportunities with Investors Group of East Gate LLC.

I would like to understand more about the different types of funds that your company offers, particularly equity funds and index funds. Could you please provide me with more information on these? 

Also, could you explain how the process works in terms of investing, monitoring the investment, and eventually withdrawing funds?

I am available to chat this week. Please let me know a suitable time for you.

Looking forward to our discussion.

Best wishes,
Lyle

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Dear Stevens Bai Koroma,

Thank you for your email and the introduction. I am interested in exploring mutual fund investment opportunities with Investors Group of East Gate LLC.

However, before we proceed, I would like to understand more about the company's track record, the types of funds available for investment, and the expected returns. Could you please provide me with this information?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "Jumbo, FHA, VA, Reverse Mortgage,
Refinance, Private Money Money market funds"? Are these different types of investments that your company offers?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lyle

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Hi, Lyle
Thanks for your feedback. At IGEG LLC, we currently have 9 different 
fund types which are;

-IGEG-MF126 (16.18% daily)
- IGEG-RX (18.05% daily)
- TRXAX (19.28% daily)
- DPREX (19.1% daily)
- PRJPX (18.35% daily)
- KWEB.DJI (22.6% daily)
- FPJAX (19% daily)
- GOPAX (26.68% daily) and
- OTCMKTS (28.8% daily)

The fund type you choose will determine the amount you're to put in, and 
you don't need professional experience to be part of this, being that we 
have specialists that run all the investment affairs, you just have to 
monitor your return which is weekly or monthly, pending on the 
investment plan you choose.

You can start with the smallest package (IGEG-RX) and see the 
performance of your purchased funds. 18.05% fixed daily interest which 
is paid out weekly/monthly, allows you to withdraw daily Interest earned 
to use for rehabs, R/E investments, personal-business expenses, etc. And 
provides you a Visa Debit Card With a spending limit of $25k Daily...

Sincerely,
Stevens Koroma

--

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Dear Stevens Bai Koroma,

Thank you for your email and the introduction. I am interested in exploring mutual fund investment opportunities with Investors Group of East Gate LLC.

I would like to understand more about the different types of funds that your firm offers, particularly equity funds and index funds. Could you provide me with some information on the performance of these funds over the past few years?

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
If there are any questions or concerns related to all investment 
packages, you may contact us anytime, we're open to doing business. We 
have amazing ETF /Mutual funds, fixed income packages for premium low 
prices... fixed interest on your purchased funds. I bet you are going to 
enjoy this mining strategy where your purchased funds perform wonderful 
returns for you over a long-term period.

Mutual funds are quite different from other investments and are 
risk-free. If you don't have that time to study the market, any 
company's portfolio, bond, etc. you have the same success buying mutual 
funds. The fund sizes are aligned with the daily income that you get.
Allows You to withdraw daily Interest earned to Use for rehabs, R/E 
investments, personal-business expenses, etc, and provides you a Visa 
Debit Card with a spending limit of $25k daily...

Understand that you share the same benefits with other existing

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Dear Stevens Koroma,

Thank you for your detailed message regarding the investment opportunities with INVESTORS SOLUTION LLC. I am intrigued by the potential returns and the diversity of the portfolio options you have presented.

Before proceeding, I would like to request more information about the risk management strategies that your firm employs. As an investor, understanding how my potential investments will be protected is of utmost importance to me.

Additionally, could you please provide some historical performance data for these funds? This would help me in making a more informed decision.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lyle

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:

Thank you for your detailed message regarding the investment opportunities with INVESTORS SOLUTION LLC. I am intrigued by the potential returns and diversity of the portfolio options you have presented.

Before proceeding, I would like to request more specific information about each fund's performance history, management team, and risk profile. Additionally, could you please provide a copy of the mutual service agreement for my review?

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Dear Stevens Koroma,

Thank you for your detailed message regarding the investment opportunities with INVESTORS SOLUTION LLC. I am intrigued by the prospect of investing in Bitcoin, forex option exchanges, global stocks, and bonds.

However, before proceeding further, I would like to understand more about the risk management strategies that your firm employs. As an investor, it is crucial for me to know how my investments would be protected during market downturns.

Additionally, could you please provide more information about the mutual service agreement? What are the terms and conditions that I should be aware of?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lyle

subject: Re: Mutual Fund Investments
body:
Hi, Lyle
I'm sorry for not getting back to you sooner. I understand that we are 
exposed to a wide range of risks that can impact investors' financial 
stability and profitability of which we have specialists who identify, 
assess, and mitigate various risks which we face in our daily trades. 
The risk side do not affect out investors so there's no problem with 
that.

Your money is secure
With all of your investments held at IGEG LLC, you'll receive 
industry-leading security.

Here's how IGEG secures your investments:
• 98% of the funds are held offline and covered by their insurance
• 2-step verification• Wallets (and private keys) are stored using 
AES-256 encryption• Mutual funds are considered equity securities 
because investors purchase shares that correlate to an ownership stake 
in the fund as a whole and IGEG provides a mutual fund agreement that 
describes the instrument's low-risk, fixed-income characteristics, and 
other account transfer terms.  

In other to process a mutual funds agreement, you will need to fill out 
the mutual funds application form on the website so I can enter your 
details in other to generate the fund's official agreements. Please 
visit www.igegllc.com/mutual-funds-application-form to complete the 
application process.
Thanks
Stevens Koroma
